Wow you have some history there that explains your buzzing activity.
   
  Kay
   
  

Michael Edwards <f1cracker75@...> wrote:
            Not me..
   
  It is about 13 years old, but was build on property that was owned by the Stone sisters of Cary, NC. The home they owned which is down the street is a plantation home, massive, and has slave quarters under it. That home was built in the 1800's.  I get voices every time I turn that radio on, but I only mp3 those that are clear enough that most people can hear them.
   
  Id love to take the radio into that house. I know the guy that owns it, and he tells me they have ghosts in that house, but they are Baptist, and not sure if they might be offended if I were to ask. I know some devout Baptist that are totally against what we are doing. Know what I mean.....
   
  Mike Edwards
   
  What has been happening to me more often is my new batteries dont last more than two days.  
   
  

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:
        Michael 
   
  Was it you that said your house was built sometime in the mid 1800's. You seem to have some strong spirits at your house. 
   
  Kay

Michael Edwards <f1cracker75@...> wrote:
    I wonder if she was a republican??
   
  I am amazed what they can see and hear..
   
  Thanks for listening

psfponies <psfponies@...> wrote:
        I heard a woman at the end say "Bush"
   
  Kay

EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:
